CustomField.description: Specify fields on the session that will be used to pre-populate fields on the payment or opportunity for a given transaction type.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Ex:{"Gift":{"Session_Field__c":"Opportunity.Opp_Field__c", "Field2__c":"Payment__c.Field__c"}, "Pledge Payment":{"Field3__c":"Payment__c.Field2__c"}}. Valid types are Gift, Pledge, Pledge Payment, Recurring Gift Payment, and Matching Gift Payment.
CustomField.label: Session Defaults Mapping
